modes.label: Processing Mode
modes.single_tooltip: Process one image or video file at a time.
modes.batch_tooltip: Process all images/videos in a folder at once.

gaslight.label: Overwrite Files
gaslight.tooltip: Overwrite existing output files instead of skipping them.

ghost.label: Transparent Mode
ghost.tooltip: Make watermark area transparent instead of filling it. Recommended for LoRA training datasets - enable alpha masking in your LoRA trainer. (PNG/WEBP only)

sigma_detect.label: Max Detection Size
sigma_detect.tooltip: Max watermark size as % of image. Detections larger than this will be skipped.

detection_prompt.label: Detection Prompt
detection_prompt.tooltip: What to detect and remove. Try: watermark, logo, text, signature, etc.

output_format.label: Output Format
output_format.tooltip: Choose output file format. Auto keeps the original format.

detection_skip.label: Detection Skip
detection_skip.hint: Higher = faster processing, but might miss short watermarks.

fade_in.label: Fade In Buffer
fade_in.hint: Extend removal backwards in time (for fading in watermarks).

fade_out.label: Fade Out Buffer
fade_out.hint: Extend removal forwards in time (for fading out watermarks).

buttons.preview_tooltip: See what the AI detects before processing. Shows bounding boxes.

marquee: WATERMARK REMOVER AI /// POWERED BY FLORENCE-2 AND LAMA /// REMOVE WATERMARKS WITH AI ///

logs.no_input: No input selected. Please select a file first.
logs.ghost_video_warning: Transparent mode doesn't work with videos. Disabling.
logs.no_ffmpeg: FFmpeg not found. Video will have no audio.
logs.api_error: API not available. Please run via run.bat/run.sh
